SetupTraits.Name: Kin
SetupTraits.Description:
Imperials are kin, can be bargained with, and will flee or surrender if heavily outnumbered or heavily losing a fight.
• Motivations: Imperials have orders they are following from whatever guild master, warlord, or under-baron they serve. Usually this is to capture a location, object of power, or person of interest. If characters can work around those orders, Imperials can usually be bargained with or even be helpful.
• Flee: When the commanding officer of an Imperial detachment is defeated, there's a 20% chance at the start of each round the remaining imperials will attempt to flee or will surrender on the spot.

SetupTraits.Name: Commanding Officer
SetupTraits.Description: Designate one foe the commanding officer of the imperial detachment. They get the "Imperial Officer" special template.

Traits.Name: Receive Orders
Traits.Description: When the Imperial starts its turn in range of a command aura, it recharges all its abilities.
